page.title: 13More Local Industry
page.content: Tennents Brewery employs a workforce of 972 at their Wellpark complex, just off Duke Street.Output stands at around 250,000 cans weekly of Tennants Lager, Super-Lager, Breaker, Ninety Shilling and Seventy Shilling Ale from their five canning lines, with further lines proposed.It's transport fleet is made up of 90 local delivery and 25 bulk delivery vehicles. Mothers Pride employ 483 people at their new Duke Street Bakery making around 1 million loaves weekly.The machine operated plant makes bread and morning rolls for the central and southern areas of Scotland.It's products are distributed by 150 vehicles in Glasgow and 27 in Edinburgh.
